casebody.data:
ROCK
v.
EXECUTIVE OFFICE PARK OF DURHAM ASSOCIATION, INC. 428P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Martin E. Rock, for Rock, Martin E. J. Matthew Waters, Attorney at Law, Hope Derby Carmichael, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Executive Office Park of Durham Association, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2017 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017."
